dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A massive fire broke out on Kerey-Zhanibek Khans Street earlier this evening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A massive fire broke out on Kerey-Zhanibek Khans Street earlier this evening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Almaty's Department of Emergency Situations, the fire occurred on Kerey-Zhanibek Khans Street.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, eyewitnesses actually shared footage with local media—it looked pretty intense, huge flames just swallowing up the building.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, eyewitnesses actually shared footage with local media-it looked pretty intense, huge flames just swallowing up the building.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A three-storey building caught fire in the Medeu district of Almaty, eyewitnesses told the editorial office and shared footage from the scene.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the fire department responded really quickly—they were dispatched at 7:36 p.m., and by 8:18 they had the roof fire localized.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the fire department responded really quickly-they were dispatched at seven thirty six p.m., and by eight eighteen they had the roof fire localized.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 4 at 7:36 p.m., DES personnel and equipment were dispatched to the Medeu district, Kerey-Zhanibek Khans Street, where at 8:18 p.m. the roof fire of a three-storey building was localized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a relief. The affected area was over 250 square meters, which is uh, a significant portion of the building.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a relief. The affected area was over two hundred fifty square meters, which is uh, a significant portion of the building.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The preliminary area affected is over 250 square meters," the department said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Thankfully though, no injuries were reported, which is the most important thing here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thankfully though, no injuries were reported, which is the most important thing here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No injuries were reported, officials confirmed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, this is the second fire in Almaty recently—there was another one near the Alatau shopping mall not long ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, this is the second fire in Almaty recently-there was another one near the Alatau shopping mall not long ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, a fire broke out near the Alatau shopping mall in Almaty's Alatau district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, in the Alatau district. Makes you wonder if there's some kind of pattern or just coincidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, in the Alatau district. Makes you wonder if there's some kind of pattern or just coincidence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, a fire broke out near the Alatau shopping mall in Almaty's Alatau district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be, yeah. But at least in this case, the response was effective and everyone got out safely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be, yeah. But at least in this case, the response was effective and everyone got out safely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No injuries were reported, officials confirmed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Firefighters did an amazing job containing it so fast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Firefighters did an amazing job containing it so fast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And you know, with buildings like that, a roof fire can spread so quickly if it's not caught early.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you know, with buildings like that, a roof fire can spread so quickly if it's not caught early.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Let's hope investigations give some clarity on what caused it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Let's hope investigations give some clarity on what caused it.
